meanings: (목숨을) kill, take sb's life; (살해하다) murder, (informal) knock sb off; (신문·문학 용어) slay; (학살하다) slaughter, butcher; ...
Verb bring down, make something blunt

vlive.korean: 당신이 의사를 죽였어! You killed the doctor! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [SF9] 농부 그룹 셒구의 밤에 오신 걸 환영합니다🌾 (SF9 playing the Mafia game)
왜 죽인 거예요 저를? Why did you kill me? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] SF9 x 우리의 밤 (Our Night with SF9)
태양이는 우리가 죽였고 - 저 사탕 하나 주시겠어요? We killed TAEYANG. - Can I have a candy? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] SF9 x 우리의 밤 (Our Night with SF9)
vlive.english: We killed TAEYANG. - Can I have a candy?

vlive.korean: 여기서는 죽은 거 아니야? - 왜 날 죽이려고 하는 거야? Isn't he dead now? - Why are you trying to kill me? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] SF9 x 우리의 밤 (Our Night with SF9)
vlive.english: Isn't he dead now? - Why are you trying to kill me?

vlive.korean: 영빈이 형 살아있어 - 살아있어요? - 저 왜 죽여요? YOUNG BIN's still in. - You are? - Why do you want me out? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] SF9 x 우리의 밤 (Our Night with SF9)
vlive.english: YOUNG BIN's still in. - You are? - Why do you want me out?

examples.korean: In Southeast Asia a virus that kills chickens is now also killing people. 발음듣기 동남 아시아에서는 닭을 죽이던 바이러스가 이제 사람들의 목숨을 위협하고 있습니다. hansemEUG
examples.english: In Southeast Asia a virus that kills chickens is now also killing people. 발음

examples.korean: He needs to learn to curb his temper. 발음듣기 그는 성질을 죽이는 법을 배워야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He needs to learn to curb his temper. 발음

examples.korean: The hunter moved in to finish the animal off. 발음듣기 사냥꾼이 개입해서 그 동물을 죽였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The hunter moved in to finish the animal off. 발음

examples.korean: He smothered the baby with a pillow. 발음듣기 그는 베개를 가지고 그 아기를 질식시켜 죽였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He smothered the baby with a pillow. 발음

examples.korean: He strangled her with her own scarf. 발음듣기 그는 그녀를 그녀 본인의 스카프로 목 졸라 죽였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He strangled her with her own scarf. 발음
